title: Drew Barrymore’s Flower Home on Sale at Walmart 2019
text:
10 items in this article 9 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy Retailer

Regular readers of the Strategist column “Don’t Dillydally” will know that we’ve been fully charmed by Drew Barrymore’s home décor line for Walmart. Called Flower, her collection is eclectic and colorful and cheap enough to add a little bit of fun to any room — especially when velvet throw pillows and pink marbled duvet covers and jewel-toned light fixtures are up to 30 percent off.

Drew Barrymore Flower Home Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow with Tassels, 20x20" $28 (was $34, now 18% off) $28 at Walmart Buy

description: There’s a bunch of throw pillows and blankets, lamps, home décor accents, and a dog bed from Drew Barrymore’s Flower Home Collection on sale at Walmart right now, up to 30 percent off the list price.
